description: The list of notifications available for the given user. These can have different types as described in the documentation for the Notification resource. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Notifications/02r30000006s000000/
title: notifications

notifications.description: JSON array of notification objects. See Notification for the properties of an invitation

notification.description: An individual notification for the given user that can be of different types. Available only to the user recipient of the notification. In the JSON response for a notification, the data property will vary based on the notification type. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Notification/02r30000006t000000/
notification.title: notification

type.description: The notification type. See the Notification types section for the list of notification types

target.description: The intended user of the notification

targetType.description: Currently, only "user" is acceptable, but in the future, there may be other target types for notifications

received.description: Date the notification was received, in UNIX time in milliseconds

data.description: The data for the notification. See the Notification types section for data properties for each notification type
